p.d: Murder for sale At the height of the sales, the owner of a department store is found dead when the doors are opened. Alice is amnesiac after being hit on the head. Who wanted to knock her out and why? Swan Laurence also learns with amazement that he has a 20 year-old son. Directed by: Didier Bivel (season 2, France, 2018) Screenplay: Catherine Hoffmann, Bertrand Lorel, Zina Modiano, based on "Hercule Poirot's Christmas", by Agatha Christie Cast: Samuel Labarthe (Swan Laurence), Blandine Bellavoir (Alice Avril), Élodie Frenck (Marlene), Cyril Guei (Timothée Glissant), Dominique Thomas (Tricard), Aurore Clément (Elisabeth Krepps), Jacques Frantz (Simon Krepps), Lara Guirao (Mathilde), Alexandre Labarthe (Thierry), Alexandre Blazy (Albert Krepps), Alexis Manenti (David Krepps) Genre: detective Parental guidance: TV-PG
